Name: Purge
Description: Cure one character of status effects.

Name: Karmaic Justice
Description: For every healing spell performed, increase power magic by 1.

Name: Morttimer's Peace
Description: Regenerates health a little bit for 3 rounds on one hero.

Name: Shared Blood
Description: Heal team for a 25% of your hp.

Name: Blessing
Description: Bless one ally, allowing them to survive one attack that would kill them.

Name: Ressurection 1
Description: Revive a fallen ally, with 20% of their max HP. Status effects before death do not apply.

Name: Ressurection 2
Description: Revive a fallen ally, with 45% of their max HP. Status effects before death do not apply.

Name: Ressurection 3
Description: Revive a fallen ally, with 75% of their max HP. Status effects before death do not apply.

Name: Rejoice
Description: Boosts team defense and magic defense slightly.

Name: Eyes of Darkness
Description: Drastically increases the accuracy of one's character's attacks.

Name: Salvation
Description: Eleanor's trump card. Completely heals and removes the status effects of one ally, and boosts their stats substantially. Very high power cost, and has a cooldown turn.
